title: Thai cave survivor reunites with rescuer at high school graduation 5 years later
description: Five years after being rescued from a cave in Thailand, Adul Samon has finished high school in America and was reunited with his rescuer at graduation.

title: WATCH:  Rehabilitated sea turtle released to join Tour de Turtles
description: A juvenile green sea turtle rehabilitated in Florida was fitted with a satellite-tracking transmitter and released to join an online race that follows long-distance migrations of sea turtles.

title: US to reopen review of Nevada geothermal plant near endangered toad while legal battle is on hold
description: Federal officials have decided to reconsider the 2021 environmental review that cleared the way for construction of a geothermal power plant in Nevada where an endangered toad lives

title: US sending F-16 fighter jets to protect ships from Iranian seizures in Gulf region
description: A senior defense official says the U.S. is beefing up its use of fighter jets around the strategic Strait of Hormuz to protect ships from Iranian seizures

title: Police searching for woman who vanished after reporting child on side of Alabama interstate
description: Police in Alabama are searching for a 25-year-old woman who vanished after telling family members that she was stopping to check on a child she saw walking on the side of an interstate highway

title: Brazil wants 10-year pause on deep sea mining as UN agency under pressure to draft regulations
description: Brazil is urging a 10-year precautionary pause on deep sea mining in international waters just days after companies and countries were allowed to start applying for provisional licenses

title: 'This is a crisis': Passport requests reaching record highs, Sen. Warner says
description: The Virginia Democrat called on the State Department to streamline the passport renewal process through hiring and a paperless system.

title: 2 boys found dead after swimming in lake
description: Oklahoma City first responders rescued two of four boys who went swimming in a lake near a dam and got caught in turbulent water.

title: Man, 22, facing charges after 12-year-old boy dies in shooting
description: A 22-year-old man, Walter Hendrick, has been arrested and charged in connection to the fatal shooting of a 12-year-old boy. The investigation is still ongoing.

title: New Mexico secretary of state interviewed in special counsel's 2020 election probe
description: New Mexico Secretary of State Maggie Toulouse Oliver was interviewed in recent months by special counsel investigators probing efforts to overturn the 2020 election.

title: American Airlines and JetBlue will end their partnership next week
description: American Airlines and JetBlue say they will end their partnership in New York and Boston next week

title: Subtropical storm Don forms, becomes 5th named storm of the year
description: Forecasters say subtropical storm Don has formed in open Atlantic waters

title: 2 killed, 1 injured when small plane crashes in Lake of the Ozarks region of Missouri
description: Two people are dead and a third injured after a small plane crashed into a wooded area near the Lake of the Ozarks in central Missouri

title: Biden administration to forgive $39B in student loan debts for 800K borrowers
description: Student loan borrowers were denied relief that was part of their repayment plans because of "administrative failures," officials said.

title: Kevin Spacey denies that crotch-grabbing was his 'trademark' come on
description: The actor got increasingly testy under questioning by the prosecutor.

title: China executes kindergarten teacher who poisoned 25 of her students, killing 1
description: A court in central China says a Chinese kindergarten teacher who poisoned 25 of her students, killing one, has been executed

title: Trump's unprecedented campaign pitch: Elect me to get revenge on the government
description: Donald Trump declared to his supporters earlier this year that "I am your retribution" and his base's appetite for that promised vengeance hasn't waned

title: 6 tourists arrested in suspected hotel rape of teen on Spanish island of Mallorca
description: Spanish police have arrested six young Germans for allegedly raping an 18-year-old German woman on Spain's Mallorca island in the Mediterranean

title: China accuses US of militarizing space after protest over Taiwan Strait flight
description: China is accusing the United States of militarizing outer space, a day after it protested the passage of a Navy P-8A Poseidon anti-submarine aircraft through the Taiwan Strait

title: Gilgo Beach murder suspect arrested and in custody
description: A person has been taken into custody on Long Island in connection with the Gilgo Beach murders, multiple law enforcement sources have told ABC News.

title: Italians outraged after judge clears man of groping teen because contact was brief
description: Italians are using social media to denounce a court verdict clearing a school janitor of a sexual assault charge for groping a 17-year-old student because it only lasted “around five/10 seconds.”

title: IRS says it collected $38 million from more than 175 high-income tax delinquents
description: The IRS is showcasing its new capability to aggressively audit high-income tax dodgers as it makes the case for sustained funding and tries to avoid budget cuts sought by Republicans who want to gut the agency

title: Death Valley visitors drawn to the hottest spot on Earth during ongoing US heat wave
description: As uninviting as it sounds, Death Valley National Park beckons.

title: India launches a lander and rover to explore the moon’s south pole
description: An Indian spacecraft is blazing its way to the far side of the moon in a follow-up mission to a failed effort nearly four years ago to land a rover softly on the lunar surface

title: Target letter to Trump Organization staffer signals new push in classified docs probe
description: Prosecutors probing Donald Trump's handling of classified documents are threatening charges against a Trump employee suspected of lying to investigators, sources say.

title: Woman arrested in connection with death of Robert De Niro's grandson, sources say
description: A woman was arrested in New York City on Thursday night in a drug dealing investigation linked to the death of Robert De Niro's grandson, sources told ABC News.

title: WATCH:  Goat jumps on owner's back as he tries to fix broken fence
description: Gizmo just wants to see what's going on!

title: Ex-officers at women's prison in California plead guilty to multiple sex abuse counts
description: Two former officers of a federal women’s prison in California have pleaded guilty to multiple counts of sexual abuse

title: Men allegedly assaulted by Mississippi deputies speak out: 'It's been terrible'
description: Two Black men who were allegedly tortured and assaulted in an incident by five Rankin County, Mississippi, deputies and one Richland police officer spoke out Thursday.

title: Pence would ban abortion in cases where pregnancy isn't viable
description: Mike Pence told the Associated Press that he supports banning abortions in cases where the pregnancy isn't viable

title: Lisa Marie Presley's cause of death revealed
description: The Los Angeles County Medical Examiner has confirmed Lisa Marie Presley's cause of death.
